verses.verse: Lord <S%H3068><s%>, how are they increased <S%H7231><s%> that trouble <S%H6862><s%> me <S%H7227><s%>! many are they that rise up against me <S%H6965><s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> there be which say <S%H559><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%>, There is no help <S%H3444><s%> for him in God <S%H430><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
But you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, are a shield <S%H4043><s%> for me <S%H3519><s%>; my glory, and the lifter up <S%H7311><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>.
I cried <S%H7121><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with my voice <S%H6963><s%>, and he heard <S%H6030><s%> me out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
I laid me down <S%H7901><s%> and slept <S%H3462><s%>; I awaked <S%H6974><s%>; for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sustained me <S%H5564><s%>.
I will not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of ten thousands <S%H7233><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%>, that have set <S%H7896><s%> themselves against me round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>; save <S%H3467><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O my God: for you have struck <S%H5221><s%> all my enemies <S%H341><s%> upon the cheek bone <S%H3895><s%>; you have broken <S%H7665><s%> the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of the ungodly <S%H7563><s%>.
Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongs unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: your blessing <S%H1293><s%> is upon your people <S%H5971><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
